story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: CodeNav Technology Co., Ltd. was born from a simple belief: the best software is built by developers who truly understand both code and users. As a company fully led by developers, we bring a unique perspective to every project we undertake.
story.paragraph2: We don't just write code; we craft experiences. We don't just use technology; we push its boundaries. Every member of our team is passionate about creating software that makes a real difference in how people work and live.

developerFirst.title: Developer-First Thinking
developerFirst.description: We understand the challenges developers face because we face them too. This drives us to create tools and solutions that we ourselves would love to use.

bleedingEdge.title: Bleeding-Edge Technology
bleedingEdge.description: We're not afraid to adopt the newest technologies. If it makes our products better, faster, or more enjoyable to use, we'll learn it, master it, and implement it.

userExperience.title: User Experience is Everything
userExperience.description: Great code is invisible to users. What they see is a smooth, intuitive experience. We obsess over every interaction to ensure our software delights.

continuousInnovation.title: Continuous Innovation
continuousInnovation.description: Technology evolves, and so do we. We're constantly learning, experimenting, and improving our products to stay ahead of the curve.

quality.title: Quality Over Quantity
quality.description: We believe in doing things right, not just doing them fast. Every line of code matters.

transparency.title: Transparency & Honesty
transparency.description: We communicate openly with our team, our users, and our partners. No corporate speak, just truth.

challenge.title: Embrace the Challenge
challenge.description: Difficult problems excite us. We see challenges as opportunities to innovate and grow.

community.title: Community Contribution
community.description: We believe in giving back to the developer community through open-source contributions and knowledge sharing.

team.title: Built by Developers, For Everyone
team.description: Our team consists of passionate developers who live and breathe code. We come from diverse backgrounds but share a common goal: to build software that sets new standards for quality and user experience.

cta.title: Join Us on Our Journey
cta.description: Whether you're a user, a developer, or a potential partner, we'd love to hear from you.

hero.title: Let's Connect
hero.subtitle: Have a question or want to work together? We'd love to hear from you.

myGrammar.title: MyGrammar
myGrammar.tagline: Write with confidence, powered by AI
myGrammar.description: MyGrammar is an advanced assistant that help you to fix your grammar. Using AI to process your request, it helps users write clearer, more effective content.

features.aiSuggestions: Grammar and style suggestions by AI

mockup.suggestion: Suggestion: Consider using more active voice

trafficTrack.title: TrafficTrack
trafficTrack.description: TrafficTrack provides real-time traffic ETA at Hong Kong, data directly provided by the goverment's API. No Ads inside, let you be able to get the information in one second after you click inside the App.

features.instantInfo: Get the information at first second

livemumu.title: Livemumu
livemumu.tagline: Peace of Mind, One Click Away
livemumu.description: Livemumu is a smart safety verification app that helps you stay connected with loved ones through simple periodic check-ins. Press the 'I'm Alive' button to confirm you're safe. If you miss a check-in, your emergency contacts are automatically notified—giving everyone peace of mind.

features.smartAlerts: Automatic emergency notifications via email and SMS
features.flexible: Customizable check-in frequency and alert delays
features.multiContact: Unlimited emergency contacts with priority ordering
features.bilingual: Available in English and Simplified Chinese
